DOC.brief_summary: To determine : 1. acceptability Korean diet Australian overweight obese population 2. Korean recipe easily prepare 3. effect Korean diet weight , blood pressure , metabolic complication obesity population .
DOC.detailed_description: The primary endpoint ( Korean diet acceptability ) assess reliability test questionnaire , dietary compliance , quantity food return 12 week . Analysis difference weight loss base participant baseline 12-week weight assessment . In order investigate impact miss data , subject analyse use last weight observation carry forward baseline weight carry forward . Other secondary endpoint determine effect Korean diet blood pressure , metabolic parameter chronic metabolic disease control Australian population .
DOC.criteria: Residents metropolitan Sydney Aged 1865 year BMI 2545kg/m2 Diabetes treat oral medication insulin Unstable angina recent onset cardiovascular disease Serious hepatic renal disease serum transaminase ( ALT AST ) > 2.5 time upper limit normal serum creatinine > 1.5 time upper limit normal urinary microalbumin > 40 mg/L eGFR < 60ml/min/1.73mÂ² Alcohol illicit drug abuse Pregnant , breastfeeding , plan pregnancy study Serious gastrointestinal disease ( inflammatory bowel disease , active peptic ulcer , recent helicobacter pylorus treatment ) Treatment eat disorder , weight loss medication drug affect body weight e.g . antipsychotic , antidepressant , corticosteroid Hypothyroidism define elevate thyroid stimulate hormone ( TSH ) low free thyroxine ( fT4 ) , current hyperthyroidism treatment Participation another weight loss clinical trial within past 3 month Individuals lose > 10 % weight within past 3 month Vegetarian eating practice Inability cook lack facility home cook Inability read write English Subjects frequently change smoke habit stop smoke within 6 month prior screen
